txt.en: 'I think we have prepared as much as we can, [placeholder]. It is now or never if we are going to leave here alive. We have armed as many of us as we can, and we are ready to set our escape plan in motion.\n\n'Let me know when you are ready.'
'We did it, [placeholder]! We have broken free of the Orc-mines... and dealt with a lot of those vermin along the way. Soon, we will stamp out their accursed existence, once and for all!'

'Are you ready? There's no turning back once we break free... it will be freedom or death for the lot of us.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This instance is intended to be run solo, but can be run duo as well.</rgb>
You ready? There's no turning back once we bust loose - it'll be freedom or death for the lot of us.<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
Before his capture, Edhere had been hoping to rally a slave revolt against the Orcs within the mine.
Help Edhere and the slaves escape
Edhere is in the Orc-mines.\n\nYou should speak with Edhere when you are ready to lead the slaves through the mines in revolt.
You should speak with Ondor the Dwarf regarding the escape from the Orc-mines.
